name: S.T.A.L.K.E.R. Lost Alpha Developers Cut
description:
Backup User.ltx
Play around with lighting settings
notes: DX9 seems to be the best option
content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Lost Alpha DC/bins/XR_3DA.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/S.T.A.L.K.E.R. - Lost Alpha DC
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: setup.exe
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2013 xvid d3dx9
    arch: win32
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    args: /SILENT
    description: Running Installer
    executable: $DISC/setup.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
